data.text: “Mi ƒukpowo, mizi ɖoɖoe le ŋkunye me!
“Ame kae de dzo lãme na ame si tso ɣedzeƒe,
Eti wo yome, eye wòƒu du to teƒe siwo meto kpɔ o,
Ame kae wɔ esia hekpɔ egbɔ be ede go,
Ƒukpowo kpɔe, eye wovɔ̃.
ɖe sia ɖe kpe ɖe nɔvia ŋu,
Aɖaŋudɔwɔla de dzi ƒo na sikanutula,
“Ke wò, Israel, nye dɔla, Yakob, ame si metia.
Wò, ame si mekplɔ tso anyigba ƒe mlɔenuwo,
eya ta mègavɔ̃ o, elabena meli kpli wò.
“Kpɔɖa, ŋukpe kple vlododo ava
Àdi wò ketɔwo, gake màkpɔ wo o.
elabena nyee.
Mègavɔ̃ o. O! Ŋusẽmanɔsitɔ, Yakob,
“Kpɔ ɖa, matsɔ wò awɔ luƒomɔ yeye ɖaɖɛ si
Àgbɔ wo, ya aƒo wo adzoe,
“Ame dahewo kple hiãtɔwo le tsatsam le tsi dim,
Mana tɔsisiwo nasi ato to ƒuƒluwo tame,
Mana sedati, logoti,
Ale be amewo nakpɔe, anyae,
Yehowa be, “Ɖe wò nyawo to.
“Mitsɔ miaƒe legbawo vɛ ne
Nya kae le etsɔ si na mí ne
Ke miele naneke hã me o,
“Menyɔ ame aɖe tso anyiehe
Ame kae ƒo nu tso ame sia ŋuti tso gɔmedzedzea,
Nyee nye ame gbãtɔ si gblɔe na Zion be,
Metsa ŋku, ke ame aɖeke meli o,
Kpɔ ɖa, wo katã wonye tofloko!
